name: Trial and Error (Dinara Abdullina)
description:
Trial and Error is a true crime interactive experience based on real controversial cases of convicted people. Read the files and testimonies, find the evidence and make a decision: guilty or innocent.

Design: Dinara Abdullina.

Development: Sagie Levy and Stav Faran.

Sound: Omri Behr.

This project was made as a graduate project for Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design.
